edu.ohiou.labimp.basis
Interface Viewable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ch2p30Class, Ch9p22Class, Cycloid, Draw2DApplet, DrawString, GUIApplet, Integrator, LissajousCurve, PiEstimator, PropertyTable, ViewObject, ViewObject.ViewPanel
public interface Viewable

This interface specifies necessary methods that its implementor need to implement in order to allow display inside GUIApplet
